monster.name: Frostwing

specialTraits.name: Aerial Domination
entries: Advantage on saving throws against effects that would knock Frostwing prone. Can hover and make sharp turns without penalty.

specialTraits.name: Scale Shield
entries: Resistance to cold damage and non-magical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

monster.languages: Understands Common and Draconic, but cannot speak

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Frostwing makes three attacks: one with its Bite and two with its Talons.

actions.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d8 + 9}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) cold damage.

actions.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d6 + 9}) slashing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) cold damage.

actions.name: Frost Breath
entries: Frostwing exhales a cone of freezing breath in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 45 (10d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Additionally, creatures that fail the saving throw are restrained until the end of their next turn.

actions.name: Arctic Dive
entries: Frostwing dives towards a ship or airborne target, attempting to slam into it. The target must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 55 (10d10) bludgeoning damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, the target takes half the damage and is not knocked prone.

actions.name: Winter's Embrace
entries: Frostwing envelops itself in a frigid aura, causing the surrounding air to freeze. All creatures within a 30-foot radius of Frostwing must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or take 55 (10d10) cold damage and become restrained for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

legendaryActions.desc: Frostwing can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time, and only at the end of another creature's turn. Frostwing regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

actions.name: Chilling Gaze
entries: Frostwing targets a creature within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Glacial Assault
entries: Frostwing makes a Bite or Talons attack.

actions.name: Frost Nova
entries: Frostwing releases a powerful burst of cold energy, creating a freezing explosion in a 20-foot radius centered on itself. Each creature in the area must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 33 (6d10) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Additionally, creatures that fail the saving throw have their speed reduced to 0 until the end of their next turn.
